snippet: Mr. Brevett was a double bassist who helped carry ska music from Jamaica to the world as a founding member of the influential band the Skatalites.
abstract: Lloyd Brevett, bassist and founding member of the influential ska band the Skatalites, dies at age 80.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Brevett was a double bassist who helped carry ska music from Jamaica to the world as a founding member of the influential band the Skatalites.

headline.seo: Lloyd Brevett, Bassist With Skatalites, Dies at 80
headline.main: Lloyd Brevett, Bassist in Jamaican Ska Band, Dies at 80
headline.print_headline: Lloyd Brevett, 80, Bassist in Jamaican Ska Band
